meanings.definition: Joe - a common male given name
meanings.sent2: Joes is a popular name in our town.
meanings.sent3: Joes always gets confused when someone calls his name.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of names, Joes stands out like a bright star.
meanings.sent5: When you hear the name Joes, you can't help but smile.

meanings.sent1: I ordered a joes to start my day.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of freshly brewed joes filled the cafe.
meanings.sent3: I spilled my joes all over my desk this morning!
meanings.sent4: The warmth of the joes hugged my soul on a cold morning.
meanings.sent5: A sip of joes can make any day better.

meanings.definition: Joe - an average or ordinary man
meanings.sent1: He's just a regular Joes, nothing special.
meanings.sent2: Joes like him can be found everywhere.
meanings.sent3: Even the superheroes need a Joes friend for comic relief.
meanings.sent4: In a world of stars, he was content being a Joes.
meanings.sent5: The story focused on the everyday struggles of a Joes.
